reviewtext: For a set of under $5 headphones, these things ROCK!  Fitment is great, they're comfortable, they sound good, they're inexpensive, they have a long cord, and an adjustable headband.  What more could you want?  I plugged these into a set of portable headset mounted DVD players during a road trip with my kids and they were flawless the entire time (45 hours of driving).  Perfect for their purpose.  DVD players - check.  Headphones - check.  Sanity - check!
